bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Criteria for Diesel-Generator Units Applied as Standby Power Supplies for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard Criteria for Diesel-Generator Units Applied as Standby Power Supplies for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The criteria for the application and testing of diesel-generator units as Class 1E standby power supplies in nuclear power generating stations is described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: diesel-generator units Class 1E standby power supplies nuclear power generating stations
